main event: On 15 September 1962, a civilian observer reported a light in the sky appearing and disappearing intermittently for about 13 seconds.
interesting points: The object was identified as one light that appeared and vanished at irregular intervals,The sighting lasted for 13 seconds,The witness was a civilian observer on patrol near an airport,There were no photographs taken during the sighting,The sighting was reported to the U.S. Air Force as part of Project Blue Book.
